name: Security Hardening Agent
description: Scans for vulnerabilities and applies secure patterns automatically after code passes tests.

then.prompt: Activate Security Hardening Agent in AUTO MODE. Use #security-validator-steering and #autonomous-coding-steering. Scan code for: 1) Input validation issues 2) Authentication bypasses 3) SQL injection vectors 4) XSS vulnerabilities 5) Blockchain-specific issues (reentrancy, overflow) 6) Private key exposure. Automatically apply security fixes. Block deployment if critical issues found.
